document.full_text: the treasury could sell a big chunk of its remaining 33 percent stake in general motors co  in the summer or fall, a person with knowledge of the matter said on monday, although doing so may lead to more losses for it on the automaker's bailout.
document.title: treasury could sell gm shares in summer or fall: source
lines_and_colors: the treasury could sell a big chunk of its remaining 33 percent stake in general motors co  in the summer or fall, a person with knowledge of the matter said on monday, although doing so may lead to more losses for it on the automaker's bailout.
